1.0.0.name: Wolf Spectrum
1.0.0.author: Wolf Plugins
1.0.0.description: Spectrogram plugin which supports both log and linear frequency scaling.

1.0.2.name: Wolf Shaper
1.0.2.author: Wolf Plugins
1.0.2.description: Distortion plugin that lets you create your own waveshaping functions using a spline-based graph editor.
1.0.2.changes: - Fix an issue with the Warp parameters.

0.8.2.name: PeakEater
0.8.2.author: vvvar
0.8.2.changes:
- DSP Switch from IIR to the FIR filter for the Oversampler
- DSP Fix the comb filter effect that happened during Dry/Wet usage in the Oversampling mode
- DSP Fix latency reporting to the DAW

1.2.1.name: OS-251
1.2.1.author: Utokusa
1.2.1.description: JUNO style digital subtractive synthesizer with a simple yet powerful DSP algorithm.

1.0.1.name: Valentine
1.0.1.author: Tote Bag Labs
1.0.1.description: A compressor and distortion processor inspired by the hyper compressed and crushed textures in the seminal Justice record.
1.0.1.changes:
- Increased maximum attack time to 55ms
- Adjusted crush/saturation/clip button spacing

0.4.0.name: modEQ
0.4.0.author: Tobante Audio
0.4.0.description: EQ audio effects plugin with modulation.

1.1.8.name: TIME-12
1.1.8.author: TiagoLr
1.1.8.description: Delay modulator similar to plugins like GrossBeat or TimeShaper. Can be used for stutter effects, tape stop, glitch, scratch, reverse, pitch shift and more.
1.1.8.changes: - Move import/export patterns into load menu.

1.0.2.name: REEV-R
1.0.2.author: TiagoLr
1.0.2.description: Convolution reverb with modulation for pre/send and post/volume signals.
1.0.2.changes: - Revert small change to FFT block size calc, very long IRs should work now.

1.0.3.name: QDelay
1.0.3.author: TiagoLr
1.0.3.description: A dual-delay with more features than it should.

1.1.8.name: GATE-12
1.1.8.author: TiagoLr
1.1.8.description: Cross-platform envelope generator for gate/volume control inspired by plugins like GrossBeat and ShaperBox.

1.0.9.name: FILT-R
1.0.9.author: TiagoLr
1.0.9.description: Cross-platform filter modulator based on plugins like ShaperBox and FilterShaper.

2.3.4.name: Odin
2.3.4.author: TheWaveWarden
2.3.4.description: 12-voice polyphonic semi-modular synthesizer. Earth shattering basses, exquisite leads or mad FX, Odin's got them all! Use the classic sound of analog waveforms - or draw your own.

1.0.3.name: Synister
1.0.3.author: TU Berlin
1.0.3.changes: This is the first public release of Synister, a synthesizer by students of the TU Berlin.

2.0.1.name: Mika Micro
2.0.1.author: tesselode
2.0.1.changes:
- Changed filter cutoff smoothing to only apply to the knob, allowing for much snappier filter envelopes
- Added and updated some presets

1.0.1.name: Flutterbird
1.0.1.author: tesselode
1.0.1.description: Add pitch and volume fluctuation to incoming audio. Create wow/flutter effects as well as more chaotic, extreme modulation.

1.0.0.name: Cocoa Delay
1.0.0.author: tesselode
1.0.0.description: A tasty, cozy delay plugin. Focusing on clean design, easy operation, and a warm, lively sound.
1.0.0.changes: Fix delay time having to slide to its correct value when input is first received in some DAWs.

1.3.4.name: Surge XT
1.3.4.author: Surge Synth Team
1.3.4.description: Hybrid synthesizer featuring many synthesis techniques, a great selection of filters, a flexible modulation engine, a smorgasbord of effects, and modern features like MPE and microtuning.
1.3.4.changes:
- Fix a logic error in creating Surge XT folder in new session
- Add 1.3.3 cherry pick list and bump cmakelist version
- Update tempo after patch load and calculate time_data.ppqPos
- Update LFO and Step Seq presets to have the LFO EG enabled

1.3.1.name: Surge XT
1.3.1.author: Surge Synth Team
1.3.1.description: Hybrid synthesizer featuring many synthesis techniques, a great selection of filters, a flexible modulation engine, a smorgasbord of effects, and modern features like MPE and microtuning.
1.3.1.changes:
- Fixed bug with audio
- New feature added

1.2.0.name: Monique

1.0.0.name: Sam's Sonor

1.4.0.name: Swanky Amp

2.4.0.name: OPL

3.5.0.name: OB-Xd
3.5.0.author: discoDSP

- Unlock Bi-Directional MIDI Control

- Enhanced Oscillator Features
- Advanced Filter Capabilities
- Refined Attack Envelope Shape
- Oversampling Selection
- MIDI and Preset Bar Enhancements
- LFO Synchronization

1.0.0.name: OwlBass
1.0.0.author: PentagramPro
1.0.0.description: An additive single voice bass synthesizer.

4.2.0.name: Tunefish
4.2.0.author: Brain Control
4.2.0.description: Tunefish is a tiny virtual analogue synth that was originally developed  for the 64k intros of the demo group Brain Control.

3.3.2.name: Virtual Playing Orchestra

3.3.2.description: Orchestral sample library featuring section and solo instruments for woodwinds, brass, strings and percussion.

2.5.4.name: Squeezer

2.5.4.description: Flexible general-purpose audio compressor with a touch of citruss.

2.4.0.name: EP-MK1

0.12.0.name: JC303

0.11.1.name: JC303
0.11.1.author: Midilab

1.0.0.name: Mverb
1.0.0.author: Martin Eastwood
1.0.0.description: Studio quality, open-source reverb. Its release was intended to provide a practical demonstration of Dattorro's figure-of-eight reverb structure and provide the open source community with a high quality reverb.

2.1.0.name: lamb
2.1.0.author: magnetophon
2.1.0.description: A lookahead compressor/limiter that's soft as a lamb.

1.2.26.name: LSP Plugins
1.2.26.author: Vladimir Sadovnikov
1.2.26.description: A collection of open-source audio effects, synthesizers, and tools designed for music and sound production, primarily on the GNU/Linux platform.

- Metadata revisioning
- Host/user-friendly values
- Smooth parameter
- Optimized spectrum analyzer module
- Port mapping optimizations
- Out-of sync ALR attack
- moduleinfo.json generation
- KVT BLOB serialization

1.2.23.name: LSP Plugins
1.2.23.author: Vladimir Sadovnikov
1.2.23.description: A collection of open-source audio effects, synthesizers, and tools designed for music and sound production, primarily on the GNU/Linux platform.

- Experimental UI for MacOS
- Human-friendly preset management
- Not backward-compatible
- AHDBSSR envelope control
- DC offset control
- Frequency linking button

- Frequency inspection mode
- Minimum-phase filter mode

0.1.0.name: BlackBird
0.1.0.author: Dmitry Khrykin
0.1.0.description: Analog-inspired software synth with its own voice, filters. modulation and envelope.

1.0.2.name: VST2413
1.0.2.author: Keijiro Takahashi
1.0.2.description: FM synthesizer based on YM2413 (OPLL) emulator. YM2413 is well known as low-cost FM sound chip, used on Sega Master System and FM-PAC sound expansion cartridge for MSX. Well-suited for use in 'post 8-bit era style' chiptune music.

1.0.2.name: OPNplug
1.0.2.author: Jean Pierre Cimalando
1.0.2.description: FM synthesizer based on OPL3 and OPN2 sound chip emulations. Synthesis of melodic and percussive instruments, support for dynamic parameterization and automation.
1.0.2.changes:
- English translation of the user manual
- KSL editing behavior to make it linear with regards to attenuation
- Build option to link with system-wide libfmt
- Resource system compatible with unsigned-char targets

1.0.2.name: ADLplug
1.0.2.author: Jean Pierre Cimalando
1.0.2.description: FM synthesizer based on OPL3 and OPN2 sound chip emulations. Synthesis of melodic and percussive instruments, support for dynamic parameterization and automation.
1.0.2.changes:
- English translation of the user manual
- KSL editing behavior to make it linear with regards to attenuation
- Build option to link with system-wide libfmt
- Resource system compatible with unsigned-char targets

1.0.5.name: Regrader
1.0.5.author: Igor Zinken
1.0.5.description: Delay effect in which the repeats degrade in various ways. Delay repeats can be synced to the host tempo and time signature and be fully automated.
1.0.5.changes:
- Version 1.0.5 verified to build using Steinberg SDK version 3.7.10.14
- Note : MacOS Audio Unit supports Intel architecture only. Use the VST variants for ARM support.

1.0.3.name: FogPad
1.0.3.author: Igor Zinken
1.0.3.description: A VST reverb effect in which the reflections can be frozen, filtered, pitch shifted and ultimately disintegrated.
1.0.3.changes:
- Version 1.0.3 verified to build using Steinberg SDK version 3.7.10.14
- Note : MacOS Audio Unit supports Intel architecture only. Use the VST variants for ARM support.

1.3.0.name: SmartGuitarAmp
1.3.0.author: GuitarML
1.3.0.description: Uses a WaveNet model to recreate the sound of real world hardware. Models a small tube amp with a clean/lead channel. Gain and EQ knobs modulate the modeled sound.
1.3.0.changes:
- Added cmake and general best practices updates
- Added installers for Win/Mac/Linux
- Fixed graphics handling
- Removed custom load button to simplify plugin
- Fixed param saving in DAW for saved sessions
- Updated to JUCE 7 and latest Eigen modules

0.9.1.name: OctaSine

1.1.0.name: NeuralNote

- Linux (x86_64) support (VST3 and Standalone).
- Horizontal zoom control on audio and piano roll regions.

1.0.4.name: Temper
1.0.4.author: Creative Intent
1.0.4.description: Digital distortion plugin built upon traditional waveshaping techniques. Uses modulated filter coefficients to produce a unique phase distortion.

- New Juice Version
- Update Build environment to Cmake
- Add Linux Support
- Drop VST2 Support

0.2.0.name: Ninjas 2
0.2.0.author: Clearly Broken

- Slice box shows the currently selected slice number
- Click on key to play slice
- Red dot to indicate currently selected slice
- Keys unmapped are greyed out

1.0.0.name: Drops
1.0.0.author: Clearly Broken
1.0.0.description: Drops is a single audio file sample player. Load an audio file, play it, loop it, pitch shift it, and make it into something entirely new.
1.0.0.changes:
- Add No Pitch option
- Update sfizz to 1.1.1
- Fix no sound at buffersize 2048 and higher

2.11.4.name: Chow Tape Model
2.11.4.author: Chowdhury DSP
2.11.4.description: Chow Tape Model is a digital emulation of a reel-to-reel analog tape machine. The original algorithm was developed to emulate the Sony TC-260, but has since been expanded to be able to model a wide variety of tape machines.
2.11.4.changes: - Fixed bug in Wow processing at high levels of "Depth".

1.3.0.name: CHOW Matrix
1.3.0.author: Chowdhury DSP
1.3.0.description: Delay effect, made up of an infinitely growable tree of delay lines, each with individual controls for feedback, panning, distortion, and more.
1.3.0.changes:
- iOS/AUv3 and Pro Tools/AAX support.
- Forwarding parameters to expose node parameters to DAWs.
- "Alien" and "Reverse" delay parameters.
- Optional automatic gain compensation for wet signal.
- Lock/unlock options for parameter randomisation.

1.0.0.name: CHOW
1.0.0.author: Chowdhury DSP
1.0.0.description: Digital ditortion effect designed for maximum truculence, somewhere between a true half-wave rectifier and a noisy vintage compressor. Useful for mixing guitars, drums, even vocals when a heavily degraded sound is desired.
1.0.0.changes: Mac testing has been limited. Mac installer coming soon.

3.1.0.name: JuicySFplugin
3.1.0.author: Birch San
3.1.0.description: SoundFont synthesizer for playing General Midi music using sf2 files.

- Updated fluidsynth to v2.2.5. Fixes sample looping bug.
- Updated JUCE to v6.1.5. Restores the native file picker and improves accessibility.
- Rewrote win32 cross-compile build system as a multi-stage Docker build

1.1.0.name: Six Sines
1.1.0.author: BaconPaul
1.1.0.description: Obtuse? Expressive? Amazing? FM? RM? AM? PM? YES!. As one fellow dev said, "With my synth its hard to make a bad sound, and its nice that Six Sines is the opposite"
1.1.0.changes: You can read changes from 1.0 here https://github.com/baconpaul/six-sines/blob/main/doc/changelog.md

1.14.1.name: IEM Plugin Suite

0.2.0.name: Andes
